twitter.title: Ted Cruz caves on shutdown, but calls it a personal win
twitter.creator: @joanmccarter

article_summary:
That's what the last 16 days of shutdown has been all about.
Well, well, well.That was pretty much true 16 days ago, too, before he conned the House into following his kamikaze plan.
@SabrinaSiddiqui Ted Cruz will vote against deal but won't delay because "the timing has no impact on the outcome."
Meanwhile, Cruz apparently thinks this is a personal win.So now he's got a kick-ass list of rubes to con more money out of.
Please sign our petition thanking President Obama and Democrats in Congress for standing up to Republicans during the shutdown.
